section_subtitle: Study projects designed to master technologies and concepts I am passionate about.

ecommerce.title: Restaurant E-commerce
ecommerce.description: An e-commerce platform that optimizes restaurant operations. It covers the entire order flow, checkout, and real-time tracking. Its architecture is designed to be a robust and easily adaptable solution for any gastronomic business.

erp.title: Cloud ERP for SMBs
erp.description: This project is the culmination of my experience in the ERP sector: a resource planning platform designed from scratch for the cloud, aiming to optimize critical SMB operations. It enables data-driven strategic decisions by centralizing all business management, from daily operations and inventory to invoicing.

portfolio.title: Professional Portfolio
portfolio.description: This portfolio is my digital cover letter, an interactive platform that centralizes my experience, skills, and projects. Developed with a modern Front-end stack (React, Vite, and MUI), this site is an active project in itself and a learning space where I continuously apply and refine my knowledge in web development and UI/UX.
